about_the_game:
Take difficult decisions in this brand-new, major content for General Practitioner which continues the story of the doctor.

Two years after the events in "General Practitioner" main game and DLC, The Doctor's fame kept growing. Finally he was chosen to lead the Emergency Department in Seattle's Hospital. Here you will meet new people, befriend or annoy some of them is up to you!

And when your romance partner from the first game unexpectedly appears things will become even more difficult!

Features:
  • 15 Emergency Room cases to enjoy
  • 2 difficulty levels: Student or Doctor for the maximum challenge with no on-screen help available
  • Two new romance option for the doctor
  • 10 new music tracks
  • New sex scenes
  • New Medical tools and equipment to use
  • Choose the look of the doctor with different new haircuts

content_descriptors.notes:
Medical Nudity, Sexual Intercourse, Harsh Language, Full Frontal Nudity.

You can skip sex scenes by choosing Vanilla Mode in the options.

detailed_description:
Take difficult decisions in this brand-new, major content for General Practitioner which continues the story of the doctor.

Two years after the events in "General Practitioner" main game and DLC, The Doctor's fame kept growing. Finally he was chosen to lead the Emergency Department in Seattle's Hospital. Here you will meet new people, befriend or annoy some of them is up to you!

And when your romance partner from the first game unexpectedly appears things will become even more difficult!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU and up
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio System

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 and up
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU and up
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio System

name: General Practitioner: Emergency Procedures

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU and up
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio System

short_description: Take the role of the Emergency Physician two years after the events in General Practitioner and take difficult choices that will impact your job and your life as well. Learn how to save lives or face the psychological consequences.
